parameters.name: Crowdedness of spaces and facilities
parameters.longName: Crowdedness of public spaces and local facilities
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the crowdedness of public spaces and local facilities that are (also) utilized by the residents?

parameters.name: Leisure facilities for locals
parameters.longName: Quality and quantity of recreational and cultural facilities for locals
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the availability and accessibility for residents of cultural attractions and facilities (also when they are primarly meant for tourists)?

parameters.name: Affordable cost of living
parameters.longName: Affordable cost of living
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on having an affordable cost of living for residents?

parameters.name: Sense of community for locals
parameters.longName: Pride and sense of belonging  to a community
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the sense of pride and belonging that locals feel towards the community and its culture?

parameters.name: Fair tourism cost and benefits
parameters.longName: Fair distribution of costs and benefit of cultural tourism
parameters.description: Are the people paying the social and financial cost of cultural tourism also the ones benefitting from it and vice versa?

parameters.name: Valorization of local culture
parameters.longName: Valorization of local culture and cultural heritage
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the value and importance attached by residents to the local culture?

parameters.name: Knowledge of local culture
parameters.longName: Awareness of and knowledge about the local culture
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the awareness of and knowledge about the local culture for both locals and visitors?

parameters.name: Natural landscape preservation
parameters.longName: Preservation of the natural landscape
parameters.description:
What is the effect of the intervention on the preservation of the natural landscape from both natural decay and human pressures?

This parameter focuses on the land itself rather than the flora and fauna in and on that land.

parameters.name: Availability of green areas
parameters.longName: Availability of green areas
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the availability and accessibility of natural areas to both locals and visitors?

parameters.name: Number of cultural tourists
parameters.longName: Number of cultural tourists
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the number of cultural tourists that visit each year?

parameters.name: Quality of tourism employment
parameters.longName: Quality of employment opportunities in cultural tourism
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the quality of employment opportunities in cultural tourism (e.g., fair wage or benefits, consistency of work during high/low season, inclusive workplace, etc.)?

parameters.name: Affordable housing
parameters.longName: Availability of affordable housing
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the amount of affordable housing that is available to residents?

parameters.name: Professional opportunities
parameters.longName: Professional and educational opportunities
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the availability of professional and educational opportunities for residents?

parameters.name: Tourism decision making involvement
parameters.longName: Involvement of locals in cultural tourism decision-making
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the involvement of locals in the decision-making concerning cultural tourism development and strategies?

parameters.name: Inclusion of disadvantaged groups
parameters.longName: Inclusion of minorities and disadvantaged groups in socio-cultural life
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the inclusion of minorities and disadvantaged groups in the socio-cultural life of the area?

parameters.name: Preservation of cultural heritage
parameters.longName: Preservation of tangible & intangible cultural heritage
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the preservation and protection of both tangible and intangible cultural heritage.

parameters.name: Pollution and waste reduction
parameters.longName: Pollution and waste reduction
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the reduction of pollution (air, water & ground) and both managed and unmanaged waste.

parameters.name: Individual tourist expenditure
parameters.longName: Individual  tourist expenditure
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the average amount of money a single tourist will contribute to the local economy during their stay?

parameters.name: Attitude towards cultural tourism
parameters.longName: Positive attitude of locals towards cultural tourism
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on locals having a positive attitude towards cultural tourism?

parameters.name: Cultural understanding
parameters.longName: Cultural understanding between locals and tourists
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the tourists' understanding of the local culture (and vice-versa, if applicable)?

parameters.name: Biodiversity
parameters.longName: Biodiversity
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the (preservation of) biodiversity in the local flora and fauna?

parameters.name: Crowdedness of attractions
parameters.longName: Crowdedness of attractions
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the crowdedness of local attractions?

parameters.name: Entrepeneurial opportunities
parameters.longName: Entrepeneurial opportunities in cultural tourism
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the opportunities for local entrepeneurs to start new businesses within the cultural tourism sector?

parameters.name: Revenue from cultural tourism
parameters.longName: Revenue from cultural tourism
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the revenue local businesses generate from cultural tourism?

parameters.name: Local jobs in cultural tourisms
parameters.longName: Number of people employed in cultural tourism
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the amount of locals that have jobs within the cultural tourism sector?

parameters.name: Financial support for cultural tourism
parameters.longName: Financial support  from public sector for cultural tourism
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the availability and quantity of financial support to cultural tourism by the public sector?

parameters.name: Hireable cultural tourism professionals
parameters.longName: Availability of qualified professional to hire in cultural tourism
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the availability of qualified professionals for hire within the cultural tourism sector?

parameters.name: Attractiveness of cultural resources
parameters.longName: Attractiveness of cultural resources to cultural tourists
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the attractiveness of the local cultural resources to cultural tourists?

parameters.name: Contemporary cultural development
parameters.longName: Contemporary creative & cultural development
parameters.description:
What is the effect of the intervention on the development of new creative and artistic cultural expressions?
This could be through financial incentives, work or exposition spaces, marketing etc.

parameters.name: Accessibility by public transport
parameters.longName: Accessibility by public transport
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the accessibility of tourist attractions and accomodation by public transport?

parameters.name: Noise pollution reduction
parameters.longName: Noise pollution reduction
parameters.description: What is the effect of the intervention on the reduction of noise pollution caused by visitors?

parameters.name: Right stakeholders and resources
parameters.longName: Right stakeholders and resources
parameters.description: Does the intervention have the right resources and support from the right stakeholders to achieve its goals?

parameters.name: Expected success
parameters.longName: Do you expect the intervention to be successful?
parameters.description: Do you expect the intervention to be successful?

roles.name: Resident
roles.description:
You are the community respresentative of a group of residents.
When you support an intervention it usually represents the collaboration and input of the local community.

goals.name: Increase livability
goals.description:
As a resident community representative it is your goal to make the region a good place to live.

In the game this means increasing the livability KPI.

goals.name: Increase equitability
goals.description:
As a resident community representative it is your goal to ensure a sense of balance and fairness between all the people living in, working in or visiting the region. This means a balance and understanding between the locals and tourists, but also a fair distribution of the costs and benefits of tourism.

In game terms this means increasing the equitability KPI.

roles.name: Government
roles.description:
You are a representative of the local government, be it a national policy maker, member of a DMO or part of a municipality.
When you support an intervention it usually represents the contribution of funding or a policy change.

goals.name: Increase lowest KPI
goals.description:
As the government it is your goal make the region flourish by balancing the needs and desires of all the people that live in, work in or visit it.

In game terms this means focusing on increasing the KPI that is currently lowest.

roles.name: Entrepeneur
roles.description:
You are a local entrepeneur, be it an investor, tech company, real estate agency or creative business.
When you support an intervention it usually represents the contribution of funding, management or labour.

goals.name: Increase economy KPIs
goals.description:
As a local entrepeneur it is your goal to improve the impact cultural tourism has on the local economy. This means increasing the income generated from cultural tourism, but also increasing the quality of work in cultural tourism for both employees and employers.

In game terms this means increasing the economic KPIs.

roles.name: Environmental expert
roles.description:
You are an environmental expert. As a scientist or engineer you have extensive knowledge of the natural world and how to use and preserve it.
When you support an intervention it usually represents the contribution of knowledge and expertise.

goals.name: Increase environmental KPIs
goals.description:
As an evironmental expert your goal is to minimise the pressures humans place on the environment while at the same time making the region's natural heritage available for people.

In game terms this means increasing the environmental KPIs.

roles.name: Cultural heritage expert
roles.description:
You are a cultural heritage expert and have extensive knowledge of the local culture and traditions.
When you support an intervention it usually represents the contribution of knowledge and expertise.

goals.name: Increase Cultural KPIs
goals.description:
As a cultural heritage expert your goal is to preserve tangible and intangible culture heritage while at the same time teaching people about and involving people in that heritage.

In game terms this means increasing the cultural KPIs.

kpis.name: Availability and accessibility of natural resources
Number and expenditure of cultural tourists
Quality of work in cultural tourism
Knowledge of and engagement with local culture
